page.title: 19AN EIGHTEEN YEAR OLD'S VIEW
page.content: I have lived in the grid area, Denmead parish,for fifteen years and attended schools outside of the area,travelling by car because of lack of buses. I attended Brownies and then Guides locally, also music, ballet and dance lessons. I sing in Newtown Church Choir. Recently I passed 4 G.C.E. "A" levels and I begin studying chemistry at Bristol University soon.I hope to be an industrial research chemist. I enjoy the peace and freedom of the countryside, the narrow lanes, the wildlife and the clean air. There is a great community spirit within the village, with few social barriers. Nationally, I'm concerned with the falling economy and unemployment, and universally with peace, arms control, racism, human rights and political freedom.
